SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.pathwrappers

Class AbstractTestDirectory<I extends AbstractTestDirectory<I>>

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.pathwrappers.AbstractTestDirectory<I>
Type Parameters:
I - the implementation type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PathWrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
RamDirectory, TempDirectory
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public abstract class AbstractTestDirectory<I extends AbstractTestDirectory<I>> extends Object implements PathWrapper
Abstract base for implementing a reusable managed wrapper around a directory of some sort.

This is designed to simplify the creation of file and directory trees, and manage the release of resources once no longer needed automatically, helping to keep test logic simple and clean.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes
